opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.

casebody.head_matter:
579 A.2d 879
ST. CLAIR AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board v. ST. CLAIR AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant.

Argued Jan. 25, 1990.
Decided Sept. 24, 1990.
